Uses of Package
editor

  • Packages that use editor 
    Package Description
    commands  
    editor  
    engine  
    gui  
    mementos  
    recordables  
    tests  
  • Classes in editor used by commands 
    Class and Description
    Recorder
    Recorder is to record the memento of commands as to replay them on the users' demand.
  • Classes in editor used by editor 
    Class and Description
    Observable
    The Observable interface describes objects that notifies its observers when its content changes.
    Observer
    The Observer interface describes objects that want to listen to the changes in the content of an observable that it subscribed to.
  • Classes in editor used by engine 
    Class and Description
    HistoryManager
    HistoryManager manages the command history by saving in stacks the memento systems created after each command altering the buffer or the selection.
    Observable
    The Observable interface describes objects that notifies its observers when its content changes.
    Observer
    The Observer interface describes objects that want to listen to the changes in the content of an observable that it subscribed to.

    Observer
    The Observer interface describes objects that want to listen to the changes in the content of an observable that it subscribed to.
    Recorder
    Recorder is to record the memento of commands as to replay them on the users' demand.

  • Classes in editor used by recordables
